item.description:
More rock climbing. Just in time for the chilly weather.

If you've never climbed before, this introductory class is perfect for you. There are no requirements, everyone is welcome and encouraged to participate in this unique experience. The agenda for the day will look like this:

-All equipment is included: Shoes, Harness, belay device & carbine and chalk bag.

-Begin with a safety course that is required to climb in all Metro Rock Gyms.

Course Includes:

Equipment: how to use a harness and belay device

Knots: tying in with a figure 8 follow-through, plus a fishermanâ€™s backup

Belaying: using a locking carbine and ATC to confidently keep your climbing partner safe

Commands: how to communicate with your climbing partner
Bouldering: have fun staying close to the ground

Technique: using balance, flexibility, and strength to move up a face

This course will provide you with everything you need to safely begin your climbing career. In addition, the helpful instructors will provide personal advise on your technique to help advance your skills in the future.

-2 Hours of Climb Time


All members that have passed the safety course will then put your newly acquired skills to the test on the walls. Throughout the day the instructors will be readily available to answer questions and give tips.

***Important*** Please arrive 30 mins early to fill out the proper paper work.

Suggested Attire: Athletic clothes

To buy tickets and for directions go to:
www.thingstodoboston.com
item.name: Rock Climbing 101
